title: 'Strahan, Sara and Keke' Deals & Steals on smart solutions for the home & kitchen
text:
'Strahan, Sara and Keke' Deals & Steals on smart solutions for the home & kitchen originally appeared on goodmorningamerica.com

Tory Johnson is back on “Strahan, Sara and Keke” with exclusive Deals and Steals on smart solutions for your home and kitchen.

Score big savings on must-have items in your kitchen, home appliances, and much more.

The deals start at just $4 and are all 50% off.

PHOTO:Deals & Steals on smart solutions for the home and kitchen (ABC News) More

Find all of Tory's "Deals and Steals" on her special deals website, GMADeals.com.

Deal Details:

1. Use the links provided below on the date(s) listed to receive the savings.

2. All deals are available only while supplies last. No backorders, unless specified by the individual vendor. No rainchecks.

3. Deals cannot be combined with other coupons and offers.

4. Contact retailers for any questions about products before ordering online.

5. Shipping rates indicated are valid in the continental United States only.

NEED HELP? CONTACT TORY: For those who need assistance with a deal, please email Tory Johnson directly: help@gmadeals.com. Tory and her team respond to all viewer emails within an hour during business hours.

By visiting these website addresses, you will leave Goodmorningamerica.com and be directed to Shopify-powered web stores. Any information you share with the retailer will be governed by its website's terms and conditions and privacy policies. ABC will receive a small share of revenue from purchases through these links.

Twisted Wares: Kitchen Towels

Original: $14

GMA Deal: $7

50% savings

Valid: 10/8/19 to 10/9/19

gma-twistedwares.com

PHOTO: Twisted Wares (Twisted Wares) More

Twisted Wares is where fun meets function. Founded by a mother of three, the Hang Tight Kitchen Towels hang over anything you want and stay secure – simply pull them through its loop. They stay in place and look great. Made of 100% Cotton Premium Flour Sack Fabric, these towels are super absorbent. Measuring 26”x26”, they are generous in size. Each features witty phrases and images. Limit seven units per order. Shipping is $4.99.

molly&you: Dips, Desserts & Bread Mixes

Original: $24 to $30

GMA Deal: $12 to $15 per set

50%-55% savings

Valid: 10/8/19 to 10/9/19

gma-mollyandyou.com

PHOTO: Molly & You (Molly & You) More
